data.author: George Santayana

data.quote: The fool wonders, the wise man asks.
data.author: Benjamin Disraeli

data.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd have preferred to talk.
data.author: Doug Larson
